4dc1f93b-97b3-52bd-82aa-44b797977e1c.question: "What is the purpose of the solution architecture in the context of implementing an AI system, and how does it aid in enhancing the current workflow?"
contexts:
A complete solution architecture that details how the AI system fits into and enhances the current workflow. 
                 The solution architecture will serve as a blueprint for system implementation and integration.

What is the baseline performance? 
                 Define a baseline performance level, based on the current system or a considered good baseline. 
                 A baseline provides a point of comparison to gauge the AI system’s performance and improvements.

This step involves defining the key performance indicators (KPIs) for your project. 
                 These should be clear, measurable outcomes that align with your business objectives. 
                 KPIs will provide a quantifiable outcome.
4dc1f93b-97b3-52bd-82aa-44b797977e1c.answer: The purpose of the solution architecture in the context of implementing an AI system is to provide a blueprint for system implementation and integration. It details how the AI system fits into and enhances the current workflow. The solution architecture helps in enhancing the current workflow by providing a clear plan for integrating the AI system into the existing workflow, ensuring that it works seamlessly with other systems and processes.
